      • isOpen

        public boolean isOpen(int[][] arr,
                      int row,
                      int column)
        Checks if adjacent spots are open
        Parameters:
        arr - represents the board game
        row - represents the row of the clicked button
        column - represents the column of the clicked button
        Returns:
        true or false depending on if there are open adjacent spots on the board

      • numberInLine

        public int numberInLine(int[][] arr,
                        int row,
                        int column,
                        int wins)
        Checks the values in all directions of the inserted point and decides if they're are consecutive matches
        Parameters:
        arr - represents the board game
        row - represents the row of the clicked button
        column - represents the column of the clicked button
        wins - represents the amount of buttons in a row needed for a win
        Returns:
        the number of lines that have consecutive matches
